item.title: Line Graph (time series)
item.description: How to use a line graph to display changes over time in selected Lahman baseball database statistics. First, install packages: Lahman, dplyr, and ggplot2. Then bring them in with libary: First, install packages; dev tools, Lahman, dplyr, ggplot2 and ggiraph. Then bring them in with libary: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) In this example, we extract season homerun totals for Babe Ruth from the Lahman baseball database.
